resources.string: Your file system doesn’t support files over 4GB
Detecting if file system can create 4GB files
Failed to open file\nPlease try looking for this file in your Library
No app found to select ZIM file!
Swipe down to scan your device for new books…
On first launch, you will be asked if the app can scan your storage. If you allow it, we will automatically detect your ZIM files without needing to add them manually.
Selecting this category will prioritize displaying downloadable books in that language at the top.
